name: Love Island Australia
overview: The Australian version of the hit UK's reality show, Love Island. In Mallorca, Spain, 10 Aussie singles will play the ultimate game of love. After finding their match, they must stay together while surviving temptations as new singles enter the villa.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Hosted by Sophie Monk from the Spanish island of Mallorca, 10 beautiful Aussie singles will play the ultimate game of love. After they find their match, they must stay together while surviving temptations as new singles enter the villa.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: 'Love Island Australia' is back and off to Fiji, where a new set of singles hope to find love (and $50,000), with a whole bunch of twists, too. Hosted by Sophie Monk.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: It's off to beautiful Byron Bay for a bunch of sexy singles looking for love. But with Bombshells & Casa Amor, there's no time to relax. Hosted by Sophie Monk.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Love Island Australia is back in Mallorca, Spain for the hottest season yet. Join the Islanders for a summer of love with more dates, drama and romance than ever before. Hosted by Sophie Monk.

episodes.name: Love was in the Air
episodes.overview: Sophie kicks off tonight’s proceedings by showing us a soft porn montage of our contestants overlaid with a soundtrack of early 2000’s ringtones… just in case you’ve been wondering how that crazy frog’s been going. Basically the girls show up in their best stripper combos (bikini and heels for the uninitiated) and wait for the male contestants to show up and choose them as a partner, based purely on their appearance. #feminism

episodes.name: Kim Divides the Household
episodes.overview:
It’s the second morning in our Love Island mansion and Hurricane Kim has left a path of destruction in her wake. Last night the bikini model bounced into the house in a whirl of hair extensions, fake tan and excessively white teeth - the likes of which we haven’t seen since Britney’s Las Vegas residency.

Fortunately for us Kim is a flirty kind of gal, systematically going through each and every guy to decide which one will be her safest bet. It’s pretty darn easy when she has the ability to turn each of them into a blubbering pool of drool. The best Justin can come up with is ‘what’s your favourite colour?’ (Green) and ‘do you remember how oranges used to make your fingers smell?’ (Seriously what the hell?)

episodes.name: Is Grant Dense?
episodes.overview: The girls and boys are realising that the next coupling is fast approaching, and it’s sent the islanders into a flurry of pacts and flirting, analysing every conversation with each other. It was all reminiscent of the pre-PE anxiety brought on when the teacher told you to pair up in primary school.

episodes.name: Time for Fresh Meat
episodes.overview: Sophie Monk - she’s just like us! Apparently last night Soph was also yelling at the idiot box - telling Cassidy and Tayla to run for the hills… solidarity sister. It remains a mystery as to why she wasn’t allowed to go in and yell at them in person - would have made for some seriously compelling viewing. Over in the bedroom, Kim is still trying to get away from Josh. It’s like the bed is no man’s land and she feels safer down in the trenches. We find out they finally spooned (well Josh IS the best at it) but Kim 150% denied Josh any mouth on mouth action. And boy did he try.

episodes.name: The Next Love Circle
episodes.overview:
Sleep. The great equalizer. You can be as beautiful, fit or tanned as you like, but the moment you close your eyes and the night vision switches on… we’re all the same. We have our mouths open and are inelegantly sprawled across the bed (two thumbs up Tash), or we elbow our bedmate directly in the face without waking up (great work Justin).

After rising and applying 45 layers of fresh tan, Millie and Tash both decide to make a play for John James… probably wasn’t the best strategy turning up in the exact same yellow bikini though? Thankfully they have different coloured hair and are thus, easily identifiable. As usual Millie is front and centre - and as usual Tash is annoyed about it.

episodes.name: Tayla Loses Her Mind
episodes.overview:
After Eden’s poetry reading last week, it seems Josh too has become inspired - treating us to the kind of gems Yeats would be jealous of. Calling himself the ‘poetry killa’ he lets us know he feels ‘fresher than a newly washed piece of corn’ and the romance is almost too much to take.

Josh trots outside to try some more fresh rhymes on Tayla, the current focus of his attention, after Kim made it pretty darn clear she has 0% interest in him. Tayla and Josh have a solid D&M about the length of her leg hair, after which she tells him not to hold her hand - so naturally he tries to hold her hand. He’s really working hard to hold the title of most oblivious man in the house (currently held by Justin).

episodes.name: Time to Slut-Shame a Girl Out of the Villa
episodes.overview:
Wounded yet stoic, Cassie cautions Tayla that she’s not ready to talk to her yet, lest she say anything nasty that she’ll regret later. Proving her deep sensitivity, Tayla keeps flapping her gums while following Cassie around, making sure the jilted blonde knows just how willing she is to respect those boundaries that she definitely will respect just as soon as she finishes delivering her neverending monologue about just how respectful she intends to be.

In an almost identical conversation, Grant approaches Josh, whose interest in Tayla was thwarted by the previous night’s re-coupling saga as well.

episodes.name: Yes we Know you're Together
episodes.overview:
Just in case you missed it, Grant and Tayla are a couple now. Tayla is telling anyone and everyone who’ll listen, including the camera in the diary room... like we can’t see the two of them constantly making out like two drunk kids at the year 12 formal. Luckily there’s no chance of anyone’s braces getting stuck together.

Tayla is all of a sudden head over heels for Grant - despite being indifferent to him three days ago - and wants us all to know it. She can’t stop smiling and telling us Grant has her back. Poor fool.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Eden and Erin go on a date. Grant gets a wax. The Islanders ride the Truth Bike and Francoise takes her pick breaking up a couple.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: New boy Jaxon sparks a jealous walk-out by an Islander. Elias kisses Millie in the strip-tease challenge.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: New arrival Mac goes speed dating. Elias and Millie go from hot to not after a night in the Hideaway.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Eden and Erin have their first fight and Cassidy breaks down ahead of the Recoupling Ceremony.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: New arrival Dom makes the boys nervous and Erin plays matchmaker.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Dom whisks away two girls for a romantic date. There's trouble in paradise for new couple Cassidy and Josh.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Loved-up Grant and Tayla return from the Hideaway and Sophie delivers shock news that two boys will be dumped from the Villa.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: The fallout from last week's shock dumping sends emotions running high through the Villa and new arrival Teddy goes on some dates.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Even Sophie is shocked as the results of the most controversial recoupling yet shakes things up in the Villa.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Tayla seethes as Cassidy and Grant get close in the Yoga Challenge whilst the two new girls, Shelby and Amelia ignite competition.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: A surprise Recoupling leaves two girls single and at risk of being dumped.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Either Cassidy or Mac will be dumped. Who will Australia send home

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Love blossoms around the Villa, but a surprise recoupling ceremony sends one Islander home.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Romance ignites in the Villa as International Love Island Day kicks off, and one couple becomes closer after a surprise gesture.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: A surprise text is sprung upon the girls on their spa day out, forcing them to make a difficult decision that will drastically change their time left in the Villa.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Excitement in the Villa peaks when two new boys enter and Sophie returns with a big announcement.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: The girls make a move towards one of the new boys as a controversial challenge brings some Islanders to tears.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: A villa challenge reveals some truths about the Islanders and the scramble is on to find the perfect partner for the final recoupling.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: As finale week continues, tensions between the couples comes to an all-time high when a power struggle erupts over an emotional dumping.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Feuds ignite as one Islander runs away from the Villa, and a controversial challenge spells the end of one couple's romantic connection.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: As the grand finale approaches, the final four couples go on intimate dates to reflect on their time in the Villa and their relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: Your favourite Islanders have spent six weeks in a villa in Mallorca, Spain, and now it's time to find out who's the winning couple as voted by viewers.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: Your favourite Islanders have spent six weeks in a seaside villa, and now it's time to find out who's the winning couple as voted by the viewers. The winning couple is given $50,000 to start their new lives together, who will it be?

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: 'Love Island Australia' is back and off to Fiji, where a new set of singles hope to find love (and $50,000), with a whole bunch of twists, too. Hosted by Sophie Monk.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: For the first time Love Island Australia will be filmed in Australia, in the stunning location of northern NSW. Hosted by Sophie Monk, a group of sexy singles are set to entertain and provide some much needed laughs as they seek true love.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: As our Islanders settle into the Villa, the arrival of a Bombshell makes waves. One strong couple look set to be torn apart as all of our Islanders realise it's game on.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: It's cuffing season as two sexy new boys enter the villa, it's time to meet Riot Squad officer Chris and former AFL player Mitch. Get ready as they are set to shake things up.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: One girl, two boys and a fruit platter, who will be the victor as it all kicks off in the Love Island Villa?

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: As the first recoupling approaches, old feelings are stirred up and one boy is dumped from the Villa.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Everybody loves Taku and Jess but it looks like they have hit a hurdle as Bombshell Emily arrives to turn up the heat and turn the boys’ heads.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Old flames, new heartbreaks and another Love Island triangle forms as hurricane Emily shakes up the Villa.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Tears and drama fill the Villa as the Truth Bike Challenge hits a nerve and one couple calls it quits in an emotionally fuelled night.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The most dramatic dumping shakes up the Villa and two new bombshells touch down to heal the broken hearted.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The two new islanders ruffle some feathers, and it's time to giddy up for a sexy bull ride as Mitch finally chooses between Emily and Tina.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: The Islanders are left sour after a game of ‘Forbidden Fruit’ and a surprise dumping sends two Islanders packing.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: One Islander lands himself in hot water after a game of beer pong and cracks begin to show as a shock twist sees Sophie return to the Villa.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Out with the old and in with six new sexy bombshells, Casa Amor is here. Who will stay and who will stray?

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: A saucy newsletter from the Villa leaves the girls back at Casa Amor in tears and the boys waste no time welcoming the new bombshells.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: You’ve got mail! The boys in Casa Amor receive a surprise package whilst the new boys in the Villa turn up the heat and turn some heads.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: In the most dramatic recoupling in Love Island Australia history, who will stick and who will twist?

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: The aftermath of the recoupling causes tension in the Villa as old lovers face-off and new relationships are formed.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: The Islanders are left shook after the "Shaken & Stirred" challenge brings the Villa to breaking point. Who will crumble under the pressure?

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: A sexy new bombshell enters the Villa, one boy is dumped as Aaron and Jess’ relationship hits a new low when a shocking decision is made.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Emotions run high following Aaron's shocking decision and two new sexy bombshells enter the Villa.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Two couples are ripped apart when the new girls mark their territory during an emotional recoupling.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: The boys pull out all the moves to get the girls’ hearts racing and Courtney puts it all on the line with Noah.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: A game of Fact or Fiction reveals some dirty secrets and a recoupling leaves two Islanders dumped from the Villa.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: It's a fur baby! The Islanders are puppy parents for the day and two couples are dumped from the Villa.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Love and tears are in the air as the Islanders go on their final dates as the end nears and the final three couples are revealed.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: Sophie Monk returns to the Villa to crown the winners of Love Island Australia 2021. Will they choose love or money?

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: It's off to beautiful Byron Bay for a bunch of sexy singles looking for love. But with Bombshells & Casa Amor, there's no time to relax. Hosted by Sophie Monk.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The new sexy singles enter a brand new Villa as we head back to Spain to see who's in it for love and who's playing the ultimate game?

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: An epic twist sends the Love Island Villa into a meltdown but that's not the only thing to shake up the sexy islanders and a red hot seductive challenge kicks them off like never before.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: New Bombs Tak & Callum choose two girls each to take out on a date, threatening strong relationships and leaving the boys vulnerable.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Bomb Callum continues to shake up the Villa by stealing a kiss, and a looming recoupling has the Islanders on edge.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: As the Villa faces its first recoupling, one Islander will be going home. And a new Bomb arrives, ready to steal a man.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Three solid couples see their relationships begin to crumble, and the new Bombshell steals a partner.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: MAFS star Al Perkins joins the Villa, quickly turning multiple heads.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The Islanders face a recoupling ceremony, and the new bomb steals a partner.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Sophie enters the villa for a double dumping, with a twist the Islanders never saw coming.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The villa is full of romance, as couples are falling hard for each other. Jordan & Stella go on an intimate vineyard date.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Two new bombs hit the villa, and in a shock twist, the girls get to spy on their boys as they date the new bombs.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Two relationships hit breaking point after the ultimate betrayal.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Bombs Vakoo and Phoebe will steal a partner, sending one Islander home.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: New bomb Ben goes on a date, and trust issues shake the villa's strongest couple.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Two Islanders are given a secret power to decide which couple is least likely to fall in love, and sends one Islander packing.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Sophie enters the villa for a recoupling ceremony, and one Islander will be dumped.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: An Islander's ex-boyfriend lands in the villa and all hell breaks loose.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: The ultimate bomb is dropped in a twist that will shock the villa.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: The Islander's play Heart Strips a Beat, and another bomb drops with the biggest impact yet.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Last year's winners Mitch & Tina are both in shock, and try to work out how to share the villa with their ex.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: The truth bike returns to the villa and hard questions leave one couple in tears.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Two new bombs enter the villa, but they have a secret....they are twins!

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: A shock dumping will split a couple up.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: One couple makes it official, becoming boyfriend and girlfriend. But a challenge will see another solid couple on the rocks.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: One couple says those big three words "I love you", and an islander will be dumped.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: The Islanders get a taste of the future, as they receive a babies to look after.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: The top five couples go out for final dates, but by the end of the night, one couple will be dumped.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: The top four couples meet each other's parents, but will they all get approval from the families?

episodes.name: Finale
episodes.overview: The Love Island Australia Grand Finale. Which couple will reign supreme?

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Love Island Australia is back in Mallorca, Spain for the hottest season yet. Join the Islanders for a summer of love with more dates, drama and romance than ever before. Hosted by Sophie Monk.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Love Island Australia is back in Spain for a new season, and new sexy singles are hoping to find 'the one'. This year, in a Love Island first - the girls hold the power.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The Villa's five fresh couples were rocked by a British Bombshell. Now, all eyes are on Lucinda as she makes her choice of which man to steal, with jaw-dropping consequences!

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: After sneaky steals last night, Tia goes all in with hunky new bombshell Reid, sending Trent into a spiral. And, the gloves are off as the war for Lucinda heats up.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: There's fiery but friendly competition as Nate and Zac are vying for the same girl. Our Islanders are in for truth, lies, and a hot new surprise who has everyone's attention.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: On tonight's explosive episode tensions run high as friends turn on each other for Kale's affections, but not before one little text rocks the Villa to its core.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A brand new bombshell arrives, and it is revealed that her past relationship is connected to Kirra. This news sends the entire Villa into utter chaos!

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Abby continues to attract drama in the Villa by narrating the "Out Of This World" challenge. Trent and Zac start a confrontation that splits the Villa. Did they go too far?

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: After a confrontation, the Villa is divided, with relationships, motives and morals being questioned. There's no ease from the drama, as Sophie announces a surprise dumping.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Whilst some couples are finding their spark, others are in for a harsh reality check. Then, whilst the boys are away, the girls welcome two new hunky Bombshells to the Villa.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: New bombs Aidan and Ryan continue getting to know the girls in the Villa. As pots are being stirred in all directions, which couples will solidify and which will crumble?

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: A hot new bombshell enters the Villa, and wastes no time in making an impact! Also, a recoupling sends a beloved Islander home, leaving the remaining Islanders devastated.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Ryan is determined to shake up Zac and Lucinda, while new bombshell Georgia is turning a few boys heads. Later, the Villa is ripped apart after Sophie launches their Villain era.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: The Villain Era has well and truly arrived! With the arrival of a brand new Bomb, which Islander will jump ship, and who will be thrown overboard in the most villainous twist yet!

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Drama has entered the Villa after new Islander Andy rocked the boat. Georgia is stuck in a sticky love triangle, and - did somebody say "Bring in more bombs"??

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: American Andy is proving to be very popular in the Villa! Georgia continues to be torn, while others are tested. Meanwhile, one couple sweetly whispers their first "I love you".

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: The two hot new bombs have warped the Trent-Georgia-Nate love triangle into a 4-way mess. Then, in the most Villain Era twist yet, an evicted Islander returns to the Villa!

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Bold movies, bestie! Tensions rise as Tyra takes on Nakia, and a brand new Bombshell threatens one of the Villas newest couples.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: If you thought the Nate-Trent-Georgia love triangle was done after the re-coupling, think again! Later, there is a villainous double dumping that rocks the Villa.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: The Islanders all take a 'dig' at each other in the "Slippery When Wet" challenge. Andy is questioning his age-gap with Nakia, and another Islander is dumped from the Villa!

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: It’s the first ever movie night in Love Island Australia history! Some Islanders are especially worried about what will be shown, and the fallout causes big drama for days.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: The Islanders are left reeling as the dramatic fallout from movie night continues. The Villain era is now over, and the last of this season's Bombs enter the Villa.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: The Islanders have entered the Make or Break Era. After many false starts, could Sav finally find her man? And new Bomb Harmony is on a mission to steal Andy.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Nakia confronts Andy after he voted to send her home, and the Islanders notice the story isn't quite adding up. Zac and Lucinda prove that love really does exist in Love Island.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Some cracks are starting to appear for one of our loved-up couples. Meanwhile, it's finally time for The Heart Rate Challenge, which gets every Islander squealing!

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: The Islanders enjoy the Hot Flush Challenge before Nakia gets a grim text. One unlucky Islander makes Love Island Australia history at the final recoupling before the finale.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Everyone is super loved up as the remaining couples wake up smiling, before finding their new egg babies! A psychic enters the Villa to give all the Islanders a couples reading.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: This morning the Islanders all meet the parents via Zoom. Later, Sophie arrives and tells the Islanders one couple will be dumped, and the Islanders must decide who it will be.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: After Sophie asking the Islanders to chose love or money, all the Islanders make their choice. The Islanders all enjoy beautiful dates before the final couples are revealed.
